actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: Congratulating the University of California, Los Angeles, men's basketball team for its National Collegiate Athletic Association tournament performance.

summary.text: Congratulates: (1) the University of California, Los Angeles, men's basketball team for playing in the Final Four of the National Collegiate Athletic Association men's basketball tournament for the 18th time; and (2) the University of California system for its commitment to academic excellence and strong athletic tradition. Commends the Pacific-10 athletic conference for its dominating season where eight of the 10 teams had a winning season.

titles.title: Congratulating the University of California, Los Angeles, men's basketball team for its National Collegiate Athletic Association tournament performance.
